pr_title: KAFKA-9161: add docs for KIP-441 and KIP-613 and other configs that need fixing

timeline.message: add KIP-613 note to upgrade guide

timeline.bodyText: Just moved this down to the "M" section
timeline.author: ableegoldman

timeline.message: add warning about rocksdb cache limit
add definition for default windowed serde classes

timeline.bodyText: Moved the "N" configs down below the "M"s
timeline.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText:
This is all newly added: we weren't defining these configs before at all, which means they had no default value, no description, were left out of the autogenerated docs, etc
I checked the KIP and it didn't specify what the default should be, so I figured I could freely choose null (see KAFKA-9559)
timeline.author: ableegoldman
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -639,16 +643,16 @@

-                    0,

+                    Type.CLASS,
+                    null,
                     Importance.MEDIUM,
-                    NUM_STANDBY_REPLICAS_DOC)
-            .define(NUM_STREAM_THREADS_CONFIG,

-                    1,

+            .define(DEFAULT_WINDOWED_VALUE_SERDE_INNER_CLASS,

timeline.message: add windowed serdes to streams config docs
fix missing default in timestamp extractor
